meanings: 자리 정하기 Is that table reserved?
쇼핑 전 It is over there.

vlive.korean: 여자 방 저쪽이야 어? The girl's room is there. 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
저쪽 분위기 한번 봐주실래요? - 네? Hey, can you check out other members? - What? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: Hey, can you check out other members? - What?

vlive.korean: 너무 저쪽으로 보고 있으니까 너무 웃기지 않아요? Isn't it really funny because they're only staring in that direction? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: Isn't it really funny because they're only staring in that direction?

vlive.korean: [왜 들어오질 못하니] - 여기인 거 같아 - 저쪽으로 갈까? [Why can't you come in] - I think it's this way. - Should we go that way? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 11. “저 사람은 랩하게 생겼네;;” 한 자리에 모인 12대학 래퍼들!! 시작된 신경전!!
vlive.english: [Why can't you come in] - I think it's this way. - Should we go that way?

vlive.korean: 저쪽? - 왜? There? - Why? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 3팀3색 스트레이 키즈가 런던 거리에 뜬 이유는?｜Stray Kids: 제9구역 시즌5 EP.01
